checkIn.title: Daily Check-in
checkIn.subtitle: Let your loved ones know you're safe with a daily check-in
checkIn.howToDesc: Simply tap the check-in button on the home screen once a day. You can also add a note about how you're doing.
checkIn.deadlineDesc: Set your daily deadline in Settings. If you don't check in by then, your contacts will be notified.
checkIn.reminderDesc: Enable daily reminders to help you remember to check in. You can customize the reminder time.

contacts.title: Emergency Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Add people who will be notified if you miss a check-in
contacts.addDesc: Add up to 5 emergency contacts with their email and phone number.
contacts.verifyDesc: Contacts need to verify their email to receive notifications. They'll get a confirmation link.
contacts.alertDesc: If you miss your check-in deadline, your contacts will be notified by email or SMS.
contacts.privacyDesc: Contacts can only see if you checked in - they cannot see your notes or other details.

caregiver.title: Family & Caregivers
caregiver.subtitle: Let family members monitor your check-in status
caregiver.inviteDesc: Invite family members or caregivers to view your check-in status and help monitor your well-being.
caregiver.qrDesc: Share a QR code for easy invitation. They can scan it to join without typing anything.
caregiver.monitorDesc: Invited family members can see your daily check-in status and receive alerts if needed.
caregiver.checkInDesc: Caregivers can check in on your behalf if you're unable to do it yourself.
